libxslt Reference Manual

xsltexports

xsltexports - macros for marking symbols as exportable/importable.

macros for marking symbols as exportable/importable.

Author(s): Igor Zlatkovic <igor@zlatkovic.com>

Synopsis

#define LIBXSLT_PUBLIC;
#define XSLTPUBFUN;
#define XSLTPUBVAR;
#define _REENTRANT;
#define XSLTCALL;

Description

Details

Macro LIBXSLT_PUBLIC

#define LIBXSLT_PUBLIC;

Macro XSLTCALL

#define XSLTCALL;

Macro XSLTPUBFUN

#define XSLTPUBFUN;

Macro XSLTPUBVAR

#define XSLTPUBVAR;

Macro _REENTRANT

#define _REENTRANT;
